issue.title: [Python] Run parquet-cpp unit tests in Travis CI
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-467](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-467). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The arrow/parquet-cpp integration is becoming stable enough that we should soon be able to re-enable these tests and use the conda-forge parquet-cpp artifact

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-467?focusedCommentId=15844572) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Just ran into this linker failure today: https://travis-ci.org/conda-forge/pyarrow-feedstock/jobs/196007972. After the API change / renamings in PARQUET-834 we should try to get this fixed

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-467?focusedCommentId=15851207) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Issue resolved by pull request 311
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/311>
